projects.title: FileFlow
projects.description: FileFlow is a robust file management solution that simplifies the process of managing and sharing files. With a focus on security, accessibility, and seamless integration with cloud storage, FileFlow offers users a reliable platform for their file management needs. Its user-friendly features ensure a smooth experience, allowing users to effortlessly store, organize, and share their files.

projects.title: Reserve
projects.description: Reserve is a sleek and intuitive bus booking application, providing a seamless platform for users to effortlessly plan and reserve their bus journeys with ease.

projects.title: Flashcard Generator
projects.description: Flashcard Generator is a web application that allows users to create, manage, and share custom flashcards. It provides an intuitive interface and a comprehensive set of features to enhance the learning process.

projects.title: Piksabe
projects.description: Piksabe is your go-to app for effortless image and video searches through the Pixabay API. Discover, download, and explore media with a user-friendly interface and rich filtering options.

projects.title: TodoGo
projects.description: A TODO app that used redux, tailwind and ReactJs.

education.name: SS Jain Subodh P.G Autonomous College, Jaipur
Rahul Chetna Public Sr. Sec. School, Jaipur ( RBSE )

certificates.title: Full Stack Web Development Program
certificates.description: On August 18, 2023, I received the 'Full Stack Web Development Program' certificate from 'AlmaBetter'. This comprehensive program provided me with expertise in a variety of technologies, allowing me to complete 50+ projects and assessments and devote over 80+ hours to coding exercises.

certificates.title: The Complete 2023 Web Development Bootcamp
certificates.description: On August 01, 2023, I finished 'The Complete 2023 Web Development Bootcamp' on 'Udemy' under the tutelage of Dr. Angela Yu. This intensive bootcamp provided me with a solid foundation in web development that covered a wide range of technologies. Under Dr. Angela Yu's tutelage, I gained hands-on experience and practical insights, enhancing my abilities in this dynamic field.
